modName: Joseph Anthonys Lip Gloss for Lunari
summary: Sexy shiny lip gloss for the Lunari Race.
descriptionHtml:
Joseph Anthony\'s Lip Gloss for Lunari
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Please endorse if you like this mod! 


CREDIT

Thanks to Bhaktisean for making the Lunari Race!


REQUIREMENTS

- The Lunari Race
LINK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602



DESCRIPTION 

This is a mod in the vein of my Lip Gloss for Better Females mod.  It adds
a strong gloss effect to the lips and slightly tones down the oily sheen 
on the face.

The head mesh has been edited slightly to provide a stronger gloss to the
specular map.



INSTALLATION

- Download and install the Lunari Race mod. 
- Make a Lunari character.
- Drop the data folder over your Skyrim data folder and enjoy.



CHANGELOG

v 1.0 - Initial Release



BARELY RELATED GARBAGE

If you like my mods, perhaps you\'ll enjoy my other artwork -- music. 
Check me out on SoundCloud at http://soundcloud.com/joseph_anthony
and my band Seed at facebook.com/SeedOfficial
author: Joseph Anthony
